verbs.description: [ARG0: Major European nations] [V: sought] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: to keep Iran in the international nuclear agreement] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump pulled the U.S. out of the pact] .
[ARG0: Major European nations] sought Tuesday to [V: keep] [ARG1: Iran] [ARG2: in the international nuclear agreement] after President Donald Trump pulled the U.S. out of the pact .
Major European nations sought Tuesday to keep Iran in the international nuclear agreement after [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: pulled] [ARG1: the U.S.] [ARG2: out of the pact] .
